synopsis: A collaboration with the Kumamoto prefecture in which Natsume and Nyanko-sensei explore the Hitoyoshi Kuma area of Kumamoto, which served as the inspiration for the series.

title.en: Natsume Yuujinchou: A Day Out in Hitoyoshi Kuma
title.jp: Natsume Yuujinchou: Hitoyoshi Kuma de no Yasashii Jikan
